Uses of Class
javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters.XmlAdapter

  • Packages that use XmlAdapter 
    Package Description
    javax.ws.rs.core
    Low-level interfaces and annotations used to create RESTful service resources.
    javax.xml.bind
    Provides a runtime binding framework for client applications including unmarshalling, marshalling, and validation capabilities.
    javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters
    XmlAdapter and its spec-defined sub-classes to allow arbitrary Java classes to be used with JAXB.
    javax.xml.bind.helpers
    JAXB Provider Use Only: Provides partial default implementations for some of the javax.xml.bind interfaces.

    • Uses of XmlAdapter in javax.ws.rs.core

      Subclasses of XmlAdapter in javax.ws.rs.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Link.JaxbAdapter
      An implementation of JAXB XmlAdapter that maps the JAX-RS Link type to a value that can be marshalled and unmarshalled by JAXB.

    • Uses of XmlAdapter in javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters

      Subclasses of XmlAdapter in javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CollapsedStringAdapter
      Built-in XmlAdapter to handle xs:token and its derived types.
      class  HexBinaryAdapter
      XmlAdapter for xs:hexBinary.
      class  NormalizedStringAdapter
      XmlAdapter to handle xs:normalizedString.
